article.title: Boeing to Provide Reconnaissance Pod to Saudi Arabia
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: The Boeing Company, St. Louis, Missouri, is being awarded an $18,446,000 modified firm-fixed-price contract to incorporate the urgent requirement for limited integration of the DB-110 Reconnaissance Pod System on eight Royal Saudi Air Force F-15S aircraft.Â Aeronautical Systems Center, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity.
